title: Telegram client not working, no initialization message or errors
body:
I am trying to connect my Agent to my Telegram Bot, from Telegram side bot isn't answering.
I checked [client-telegram](https://github.com/elizaos-plugins/client-telegram) and saw that there should be:
` Startup Logging: Logs successful initialization of the Telegram client for better debugging.` but for some reason there's not a single thing about Telegram. My top of json looks like this:

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/ed4bac71-899e-4db4-a0dc-afa0dd999559)


I've added `TELEGRAM_BOT_TOKEN` to both json and .env, I have needed dependency installed which is currently on this version `@elizaos/client-telegram 0.25.6-alpha.1` and from Telegram side Bot is responding to /getMe

Is there something that I've missed of requirements?

comments.author: github-actions
comments.body: Hello @JJOptimist! Welcome to the elizaOS community. Thank you for opening your first issue; we appreciate your contribution. You are now an elizaOS contributor!
